title: Flinging Dirt
description: They say like attracts like. Considering Chris Loman’s reputation, he’s been known to attract some very wild and colorful girls. All that changes when he meets shy, studious Miriam Pritchard.Doing a major landscaping job on The Prichard’s backyard, Chris has a birds-eye view on Miriam’s life and soon discovers a secret that will leave her needing him more than ever.As Miriam’s backyard transforms into a peaceful oasis, Chris transforms from a misdirected bad-boy to a responsible entrepreneur. Thrown together for a life changing summer they’ll never forget, the dirt flies and hearts open to the possibilities of love. Maybe opposites really do attract.
author: Rebecca Montemurro
